name: viscosity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or state of being viscous (= thick and sticky and not flowing easily): The viscosity of the fluid in the system can be modified. Fish oils reduce inflammation in the arteries, and improve your blood viscosity. See
viscous
More examplesFewer examplesThe increase in the number of red blood cells produced increases the viscosity of the blood.We learn to sense how calorie-packed a food is by its sweetness and viscosity. Olive oil is also graded by its thickness, or viscosity.
